```{r setup, include=FALSE, fig.cap= "Endring av maksimalt oksygenopptak fra Pre- posttest"}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(ggtext)
library(ggplot2)
library(esquisse)
library(janitor)

figurdata <- read_excel("data/Revidert_resultatskjema.xlsx", na = "NA") #Henter data

Vo2figur_itt <- figurdata %>%
select(id, time, group, vo2max_ml_min_kg_6x5, vo2max_ml_min_6x5)%>%
print()
 

Vo2figur_itt$time <- factor(Vo2figur_itt$time, levels = c("pre", "post"), labels = c("Pre", "Post"))
Vo2figur_itt$group <-factor(Vo2figur_itt$group,levels = c("fls", "kon"), labels = c("Friklivssentral", "Kontroll"))

Vo2kg_figur_itt <-ggplot(Vo2figur_itt, aes(time, vo2max_ml_min_kg_6x5, group = id)) + geom_line() + geom_point(size = 2, fill = "lightblue", shape = 21) +
  labs(x = "Tidspunkt", 
       y = "VO<sub>2max</sub> (ml min<sup> -1</sup>)", color = "Group") + stat_summary(aes(group = 1), geom = "point", fun.y = mean,
    shape = 17, size = 3) + facet_grid(. ~ time) + facet_wrap(vars(group)) + geom_smooth()


Vo2_figur_itt <- ggplot(Vo2figur_itt, aes(time, vo2max_ml_min_6x5, group = id)) + geom_line() + geom_point(size = 2, fill = "lightblue", shape = 21) +
  labs(x = "Tidspunkt", 
       y = "VO<sub>2max</sub> (ml min<sup> -1</sup>)", color = "Group") + stat_summary(aes(group = 1), geom = "point", fun.y = mean,
    shape = 17, size = 3) + facet_grid(. ~ time) + facet_wrap(vars(group)) + geom_smooth()





```
